summary: This is an email dated August 10, 2019, with the subject 'Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update', sent the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death. It appears to be a status update regarding his monitoring status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, noting 'Suicide Watch None' and 'Psych Observation'.

events.title: Suicide Watch Status Update
events.description: An email is sent regarding an update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, indicating he was not on suicide watch at that time.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The subject line indicates it is an update on 'Suicide Watch/Psych Observation'.
The content states 'Suicide Watch None' and 'Psych Observation', suggesting a change or status report on his monitoring.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
The timing of this update, one day before Epstein's death, makes it a critical document in the investigation into the circumstances of his death.
